name: HP Refurbished 13.3" Folio 13-1029wm Laptop PC with Intel Core i3-2367M Processor, 4GB Memory, 128GB SSD and Windows 7 Home Premium

reviews.name: HP Refurbished 13.3" Folio 13-1029wm Laptop PC with Intel Core i3-2367M Processor, 4GB Memory, 128GB SSD and Windows 7 Home Premium
reviews.reviewText: This device is light, boots quickly, and can do everything that the big desktop PCs do.
reviews.title: Productive Machine

reviews.name: HP Refurbished 13.3" Folio 13-1029wm Laptop PC with Intel Core i3-2367M Processor, 4GB Memory, 128GB SSD and Windows 7 Home Premium
reviews.reviewText:
Being my first non- laptop, I was a bit concerned about loading programs on it; my USB CD player took care of that in a heartbeat! As it's meant as a work backup machine, I'm unconcerned about the small (128 G) drive, but love the fact that it's solid state. Pretty fast boot, great WiFi. About the only minus is the resolution- fine for QuickBooks, but I wouldn't want to watch a movie on it (but it's a work backup, remember?). And a second USB 3.0 port would have been nice...

All in all, a nice, light, portable machine for the price.
reviews.title: HP Folio vs. laptop...

reviews.name: HP Refurbished 13.3" Folio 13-1029wm Laptop PC with Intel Core i3-2367M Processor, 4GB Memory, 128GB SSD and Windows 7 Home Premium

reviews.name: HP Refurbished 13.3" Folio 13-1029wm Laptop PC with Intel Core i3-2367M Processor, 4GB Memory, 128GB SSD and Windows 7 Home Premium
reviews.reviewText:
This is the best computer I have ever owned.
Get the extended warranty just in case.
The warranty company is exceptional.
reviews.title: Best Laptop for the Money

reviews.name: HP Refurbished 13.3" Folio 13-1029wm Laptop PC with Intel Core i3-2367M Processor, 4GB Memory, 128GB SSD and Windows 7 Home Premium
reviews.reviewText: I love the HP Folio 13 series of ultrabooks! This is the third Folio 13 I have purchased (one for myself, one for my wife and one for the kids). I like the sleek form factor, the light weight and the tactile feel of the keyboard. Also, the long battery life is very hard to beat. I may buy another one to use as a music server for my stereo.
reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
